title: No, Times of India Didn’t Say Modi and Xi Will ‘Mate’ in Wuhan
subtitle: Ahead of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday, 27 April, The Times of India’s headline screaming that the two leaders will “mate” six times in 24 hours went viral.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
However, The Times of India did not publish the “mate” headline, it was photoshopped!

The original story, published in their print edition on 27 April carried a headline that read: “Modi, Xi will meet 6 times in 24 hours”.
